Package fr.uga.miage.pc.dilemme.strategie

Class Strategie

java.lang.Object
fr.uga.miage.pc.dilemme.strategie.Strategie
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStrategie, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DonnantDonnant, DonnantDonnantDur, Gentille, Mechante, Mefiante, PerGentille, PerMechant, Rancuniere
public abstract class Strategie
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStrategie
This class constructs a object Strategie which implements the interface IStrategie. A Strategie represents a way of thinking for a certain situation, a certain context. Example : A Strategie "Good" could represent a person who always cooperate. This class was created for a french university project
Since:
1.0
See Also:
IStrategie
